title: Katsushi Kurihara
text:
is a Japanese former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Kurihara was born in <a href="Chiba%20Prefecture">Chiba Prefecture</a> on July 29, 1977. He joined his local club <a href="JEF%20United%20Chiba">JEF United Ichihara</a> from youth team in 1996. He played many matches as left side back and left side midfielder. The club also won the 2nd place <a href="1998%20J.League%20Cup">1998 J.League Cup</a>. He retired end of 1999 season.
